text:
The people are so warm and inviting!
The leadership team is compassionate.
A truly wonderful Church to worship in!

I felt very welcomed and warm during my visit. The people are friendly without being weird. I felt their sincerely and joy in getting to know you.

The preaching is Bible centred which I enjoyed much. A church that takes community work seriously and at the same time offering “an open welcome door” policy. No obligations at all.

Children program are available too.
It’s a nice family church. Young and old are welcome there.

Ample car parking too !

I have been occasionally attending the first time QBC since 2019 which one of  my friends invited but I was not familiar with anyone in Church members or pastors. After COVID situation, I have chances to attend the church according to my personal choice which is bring in me to gets new friends and gets to know more about the Lord who has been in my heart to believe more, trust more which makes me confident to be being Christian. Whenever I attend to the church, I feels that’s my home which is warmly welcomed, heartily friended, and the most supportive is people who have positive vibes, attitudes which I always wanted to surround myself with all these.

I've been so warmly welcomed by the pastors— especially the senior pastor—and members of the church ever since I've stepped into the church. Very sound teaching and preaching I've heard so far and I guess I'll call this place my home church in no time.

Looking forward to be part of the community and serve with this church.
